TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the world is alienized.

I may or may not wish for a cup of tee.

granted. You get nothing.

I wish i was on the polar express.. and i would operate it.

Granted. And by operate it, I mean you're the stoker.

I wish my data would import already.

Granted, but it gets corrupted and you can only scrap it =(

I wish for a million bucks. i'm ready for both outcomes. Let's see if my new deer(+human) repellent is worth anything

Granted. You now have a million teeth and a massive overbite.

I wish for a unified currency for Earth.

Granted. It promptly suffers catastrophic hyperinflation, wiping out your savings. At the same time a new weapon accidentally triggers global natural disasters, demolishing your home and flattening your car. And a new pathogen arises that feeds on gold and silver and emits deadly gas, rendering the precious metal worthless, indeed hazardous.

I wish I could add another way to corrupt that.

Granted! All ways to corrupt said wish appear inside you head, causing mass internal bleeding and convulsions as your brain expands, until you die.

I wish for a Llamacat.

Granted. But The llama spits at you a million times due to the acid of them.. and its poisonous

I wish that i could Make A tardis/train/delorean/hogwarts express crossover and to Make it run on Pure potatos. and hope to not make it blow up

Granted, but pure potatoes just went extinct! Only genetically engineered, and cross breeds are now available.

I wish for cabbage.

Granted. But due to Cole's Law, it is all thinly sliced and served cold with a bunch of other stuff.

I wish for coleslaw.

granted. but instead coleslaw soup falls on you.. Non-corrupted wish for you this time buddy. but ill corrupt you again!

I wish that..santa will get me a wii u for christmas!

Granted. It's broken.

I wish for a christmas tree.

Granted. It suddenly grows to redwood size in your house.

I wish they sold jeans in a 37" waist.

Granted. Jeans can now be purchased in portions of 37/21600. As in, 37 minutes out of 360 degrees.

I wish that the idea of being in the sky could support 50 people.

granted. everyone falls and breaks their neck after a second.

i wish for no couruption

Granted. There is, however, plenty of corruption, which makes your head explode.

I wish the American mm/dd/yyyy date format would go die in a fire.
Granted, but the wish granters make a mistake, and remove the non-American date system. TBH I wish the American date system was used globally. I mean, the USA made us win both world wars!

Granted, but turns out the world is so upset by this that USA enters in war with all countries in the world (except Peru). USA becomes a territory shared by all the major winners.

I wish for an M-65 Atomic Cannon.

Granted, but it's one that backfires. Not necessarily from it's back, but from the part that's pointed at you O.O

I wish people didn't use one word for 100 different things }:-[

Granted. All humans get eaten by thesauruses.

I wish for a new spaceplane part.

Granted, but it's a paid DLC.

I desire macaroni pictures.

Granted. But actual edible macaroni is forever forgotten to the mists of time.

I wish time was actually mist.

Granted, life is now meaningles time is a white hase.

I wish that earth is a giant pineapple.
Granted, life is now meaningless time is a white haze.

Granted. You fall on to one of the spikes.

I wish I was Anna in the exact situation she's in in my signature.
